alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Guilford; Orange; Person; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 7:31PM EST until January 12 at 8:15PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Alamance County in central North Carolina... Person County in central North Carolina... Northern Orange County in central North Carolina... Northern Randolph County in central North Carolina... Eastern Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 815 PM EST. * At 730 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monroeton to 10 miles south of Thomasville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, High Point, Burlington, Asheboro, Graham, Roxboro, Hillsborough, Randleman, Mebane and Elon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
